#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

struct Dating_kit
{
    int type;
    int quality;
    int price;
}object[102];
int prev_price[7], sum=0, own_money;

bool comparator(Dating_kit a, Dating_kit b)
{
    return a.quality>b.quality;
}

bool check()
{
    for(int i=1;i<7;i++)
    {
        if(prev_price[i]==0)
        {
            //cout<<i<<" type"<<endl;
            return false;
        }
    }

    if(sum<=own_money)
        return true;
    else
        return false;
}

int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d %d", &n, &own_money);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d %d %d", &object[i].type, &object[i].price, &object[i].quality);
    }
    sort(object, object+n, comparator);
    /*
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        printf("%d %d %d\n", object[i].type, object[i].price, object[i].quality);
    }
    */
    bool flag=true;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        sum+=object[i].price;
        sum-=prev_price[object[i].type];
        prev_price[object[i].type]=object[i].price;
        if(check())
        {
            printf("%d\n", object[i].quality);
            flag=false;
            break;
        }
    }
    if(flag)
        printf("0\n");
}
